phrs.translation: 助手, 伙伴, 副主教

sentences.sentence: I found an enthusiastic coadjutor in the person of a young fellow named Wang Ming.
sentences.translation: 我获得一个名叫王明的热心青年助手。

sentences.sentence: Fengxiang diocese in central Shaanxi province has elected its coadjutor bishop candidate in an “open, just, fair and free” process.
sentences.translation: 中国西北部陕西省凤翔教区日前召开扩大会议，在「公开、公正、公平和自由」的过程中选出候任主教。
